query: SELECT s.id, s.status, s.startedAt, s.completedAt, s.totalHotels, s.completedHotels, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scanResults WHERE scanId = s.id) as resultCount FROM scans s ORDER BY s.id DESC LIMIT 1
